data.helperPod.yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: helper-pod
spec:
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  tolerations:
    - key: node.kubernetes.io/disk-pressure
      operator: Exists
      effect: NoSchedule
  containers:
  - name: helper-pod
    image: busybox
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: helper-pod
spec:
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  tolerations:
    - key: node.kubernetes.io/disk-pressure
      operator: Exists
      effect: NoSchedule
  containers:
  - name: helper-pod
    image: busybox
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: helper-pod
spec:
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  tolerations:
    - key: node.kubernetes.io/disk-pressure
      operator: Exists
      effect: NoSchedule
  containers:
  - name: helper-pod
    image: busybox
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

initErrors:
Helm release "minio/minio-community-30f04c35" failed to initialize completely. Use Helm CLI to investigate: failed to become available within allocated timeout. Error: Helm Release minio/minio-community-30f04c35: post-upgrade hooks failed: 1 error occurred:
